metadata.synopsis: Male Half Orc. Guard and Absolute cultist.

0.speaker: Zealot Munish
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped Balthazar (and this Nightsong) return to Moonrise. He's down in the Colony.NodeContext: Blessing

1.speaker: Zealot Munish
1.text: You rescued the General's advisor? Can't say I missed the screaming from his chambers.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped Balthazar (and this Nightsong) return to Moonrise. He's down in the Colony.NodeContext: Frightened, wary of Balthazar (the general's advisor)

2.speaker: Zealot Munish
2.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)NodeContext: Respectful

3.speaker: Zealot Munish
3.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.

4.speaker: Zealot Munish
4.text: See you in the city, True Soul. My family's bakery will be spared - we'll have ourselves a feast.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.NodeContext: Anticipation, friendly (he's certain the cult's invasion won't harm his family)

5.speaker: Zealot Munish
5.text: I won't keep you, True Soul. Always Her work to be done.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)NodeContext: Respectful but growing uncomfortable - we're high-ranking and not someone whose attention he wants to draw
